title: The Extraordinary experience of Nicholas Nodwell
brief_description: Nicholas is usually inattentive at school and likes to daydream. During a lesson on the production and uses of petroleum he finds himself transported into a strange world without petroleum. He learns how much our modern society depends on petroleum products. Script by Frank Colyer.
